entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
